meanings.sent1: The overalled farmer worked in the fields.
meanings.sent2: The children looked cute in their overalled outfits.
meanings.sent3: The overalled scarecrow seemed to be guarding the crops.
meanings.sent4: The overalled mechanic fixed the car with precision.
meanings.sent5: The overalled painter splashed colors on the canvas with enthusiasm.

meanings.definition: Covered with or made of overalls.
meanings.sent1: The overalled man had tools sticking out of his pockets.
meanings.sent2: The overalled tablecloth was perfect for the farm-themed party.
meanings.sent3: The overalled dog looked ready to join a construction crew.
meanings.sent4: The overalled walls of the barn were weathered and sturdy.
meanings.sent5: The overalled sofa in the living room added a touch of rustic charm.
